docs.text: gov.nist.trec.tipster TIPSTER is sometimes also called the Text Research Collection Volume or TREC. The TIPSTER project was sponsored by the Software and Intelligent Systems Technology Office of the Advanced Research Projects Agency (ARPA/SISTO) in an effort to significantly advance the state of the art in effective document detection (information retrieval) and data extraction from large, real-world data collections. The detection data is comprised of a test collection built at NIST for the TIPSTER project and the related TREC project. The TREC project has many other participating information retrieval research groups, working on the same task as the TIPSTER groups, but meeting once a year in a workshop to compare results (similar to MUC). The test collection consists of three CD-ROMs of SGML encoded documents distributed by LDC plus queries and answers (relevant documents) distributed by NIST. See also https://trec.nist.gov/data/docs_eng.html and https://trec.nist.gov/data/intro_eng.html List of datasets gov.nist.trec.tipster.ap88 Associated Press document collection (1988) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ap89 Associated Press document collection (1989) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ap90 Associated Press document collection (1990) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.doe1 Department of Energy documents Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj87 Wall Street Journal (1987) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj88 Wall Street Journal (1988) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj89 Wall Street Journal (1989) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj90 Wall Street Journal (1990) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj91 Wall Street Journal (1991) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.wsj92 Wall Street Journal (1992) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.fr88 Federal Register (1988) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.fr89 Federal Register (1989) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.fr94 Federal Register (1994) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ziff1 Information from the Computer Select disks (1989-90) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ziff2 Information from the Computer Select disks (1989-90) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ziff3 Information from the Computer Select disks (1990-91) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.sjm1 San Jose Mercury News (1991) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.cr1 TODO Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.ft1 Financial Times Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.fbis1 Foreign Broadcast Information Service (1996) Tags : Tasks : gov.nist.trec.tipster.la8990 Los Angeles Times (1989-90) Tags : Tasks :

docs.text: TIPSTER is sometimes also called the Text Research Collection Volume or TREC. The TIPSTER project was sponsored by the Software and Intelligent Systems Technology Office of the Advanced Research Projects Agency (ARPA/SISTO) in an effort to significantly advance the state of the art in effective document detection (information retrieval) and data extraction from large, real-world data collections. The detection data is comprised of a test collection built at NIST for the TIPSTER project and the related TREC project. The TREC project has many other participating information retrieval research groups, working on the same task as the TIPSTER groups, but meeting once a year in a workshop to compare results (similar to MUC). The test collection consists of three CD-ROMs of SGML encoded documents distributed by LDC plus queries and answers (relevant documents) distributed by NIST. See also https://trec.nist.gov/data/docs_eng.html and https://trec.nist.gov/data/intro_eng.html

docs.text: edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint The AQUAINT Corpus, Linguistic Data Consortium (LDC) catalog number LDC2002T31 and ISBN 1-58563-240-6 consists of newswire text data in English, drawn from three sources: the Xinhua News Service (People's Republic of China), the New York Times News Service, and the Associated Press Worldstream News Service. It was prepared by the LDC for the AQUAINT Project, and will be used in official benchmark evaluations conducted by National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). List of datasets edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint.apw Associated Press (1998-2000) Tags : Tasks : edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint.nyt New York Times (1998-2000) Tags : Tasks : edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint.xie Xinhua News Agency newswires (1996-2000) Tags : Tasks : edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint Aquaint dataset Tags : Tasks :
docs.title: edu.upenn.ldc.aquaint

It was prepared by the LDC for the AQUAINT Project, and will be used in official benchmark evaluations conducted by National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).

docs.text: edu.stanford.glove GloVe is an unsupervised learning algorithm for obtaining vector representations for words. Training is performed on aggregated global word-word co-occurrence statistics from a corpus, and the resulting representations showcase interesting linear substructures of the word vector space. List of datasets edu.stanford.glove.6b Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.6b.50 Glove 6B - dimension 50 Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.6b.100 Glove 6B - dimension 100 Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.6b.200 Glove 6B - dimension 200 Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.6b.300 Glove 6B - dimension 200 Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.42b Glove embeddings trained on Common Crawl with 42B tokens Tags : Tasks : edu.stanford.glove.840b Glove embeddings trained on Common Crawl with 840B tokens Tags : Tasks :
